column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba has an extensive menu
column2: mostly all tapas style. We ordered the spinach and cheese stuffed mushrooms
column5: squid and paella for a party of 4. My favorite dish was the squid.. extremely flavorful and tender. All the food was actually very flavorful
column6: though a little salty for my taste (might just be my personal preference). The cava sangria was phenomenal. If I'm in Chicago again
column7: I'd love to come back to try other menu items.
